summary: Alien creatures invade a small town and four teenagers, along with a young boy, attempt to escape from them.

McPherson|John Tiger|Eric C. Hammarstrom|John Riley|Skip Williamson|Gary De Franco|Ken Burge|David Steck|Elizabeth Marner-Brooks
title: Criaturas asesinas
